data.title: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
data.content:
We take a proactive approach to user privacy and ensure necessary steps are taken to protect your data during your visit. Our website complies with all EU laws and requirements for user privacy.

### How We Use Your Information
When you download material or communicate with us, we may collect your name, company, email, phone number, and title. This information is used for:
*   **Website Administration**: Managing our site and applications.
*   **Client Management**: Updating our client databases.
*   **Marketing**: Sending relevant marketing materials.

### Your Rights Under GDPR
You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
*   **Right to be Informed**: Know how we collect and use your data.
*   **Right of Access**: Request a copy of the data we hold on you.
*   **Right to Rectification**: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information.
*   **Right to Erasure**: Ask us to delete your data ("Right to be forgotten").
*   **Right to Restrict Processing**: Prevent the processing of your data.
*   **Right to Object**: Object to your data being used for specific purposes.
*   **Right to Data Portability**: Move your data to another service.

### Data Retention & Sharing
*   **Retention**: We do not keep your information longer than necessary for the purpose it was collected.
*   **Sharing**: We never share your personal information with authorities outside the EU/EEA unless instructed by you or a European authority.
*   **Security**: We take additional steps to ensure your data is treated safely and securely even when processed in 'third countries'.

### Contact Us
If you wish to access, update, or delete your information, please contact our Group Marketing & Communications team at our India office.
